Projects

EPlayer
An electron-based multiplatform music player. Written in pure javascript html and css, extensible and pretty. Currently under development! Previously known as GCPlayer.
DBusBot
A chatbot to ask for arrival times of DBus company buses. Written using Microsoft bot framework.
Kaixo Mundua
A web portal to upload and share your own photos done using written in Python and managed by Google Chrome AppEngine.
Radio
A radio station player written in PHP, Javascript, HTML and CSS.
